title: zakservers
author: zakservers
content: We are pleased to announce the new line of offshore dedicated servers in Switzerland, you can also customize these dedicated servers to your requirements kindly consult with sales department for that.Bandwidth is also available from 20TB with 1gbps uplink to Unmetered with 10gbps uplink.Switzerland S-1Dual Intel Xeon E562032GB1 TB SSD1Gbps Uplink20TB BandwidthPrice: $199/monthVisit the above newly launched plan and other available plans: https://zakservers.com/offshore-dedicated-servers.phpTo customize the configuration in Switzerland kindly contact with sales.All offshore dedicated servers come with our 100% uptime guarantee and 24/7/365 customer caring support.Bitcoin is accepted as a payment method.
